text:
Oh!
Nice, nice! The feel of the new fabric...!

Well then, before trying them on right away...
Yuika, have you made up your mind?
Yuika, could it be that you're still undecided...?

N-No, um...
Well, since then, I've been thinking...

Which version of Yuika
should wear this costume?

...I'm not sure
which one is more suitable.

──... I know I've said this before,
but whichever one Yuika desires...

That's exactly it!
I can't decide by myself...!

...P-tan, between with glasses and without glasses,
which one do you think is better?
